mapper.select: select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and object_state = '0' and pro_id=#{pro_id} and object_id in (select object_id from tab_object_user where user_name=#{user_name}) order by pro_id

select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and pro_id=#{pro_id} order by pro_id

select *,(select GROUP_CONCAT(user_xm separator ',') from tab_user where user_name in (select user_name from tab_object_user where object_id=tab_callobject.object_id) group by tab_callobject.object_id) object_users,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' order by pro_id
mapper.update:
update tab_callobject
object_pnumber = #{object_pnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
object_remark = #{object_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_id = #{pro_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
column1 = #{column1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
column2 = #{column2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where object_id = #{object_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tab_callobject
object_state = #{object_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_time = #{out_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
call_user = #{call_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where object_id = #{object_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and pro_id=#{pro_id} and object_state not in ('0','1') order by pro_id

select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and pro_id=#{pro_id} and object_state = '2' order by pro_id

select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and pro_id=#{pro_id} and object_state not in ('0','1','2') order by pro_id

select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and call_user=#{user_name} and object_state not in ('0','1') order by pro_id

select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and call_user=#{user_name} and object_state = '2' order by pro_id

select *,(select pro_name from tab_project where pro_id=tab_callobject.pro_id) pro_name, case when object_state='0' then '初始状态' when object_state='1' then '外呼中' when object_state='2' then '外呼成功' when object_state='3' then '关机' when object_state='4' then '停机' when object_state='5' then '空号' when object_state='6' then '无人接听' when object_state='7' then '中途续约' when object_state='8' then '中途挂机' when object_state='9' then '挂机' else '其他状态' END state_name, (select user_xm from tab_user where user_name=tab_callobject.call_user) call_user_name from tab_callobject where object_mark='0' and call_user=#{user_name} and object_state not in ('0','1','2') order by pro_id
